roleset.name: put under certain pressure

role.descr: amount increased by, EXT or MNR

example.name: pressurize-v: with end point
example.text: They stayed in " econo " mode , pressurized the tires to 70 psi and with all the hills involved , drove the entire 65 kilometers and added another 2.5 kilometers for good measure for a total of 67.5 kilometers ( 42 miles ) .

example.name: pressurize-v: passive
example.text: At a cruising altitude of 39,000 feet ( FL 390 ) , a Boeing 767 's cabin will be pressurized to an altitude of 6,900 feet .

example.name: pressurize-v: metaphorical
example.text: Latvia is pressurizing the European Court of Human Rights over the case of Soviet World War II veteran Vasily Kononov , the 85 - year - old former partisan 's lawyer said Monday .

propbank.arg: the European Court of Human Rights
over the case of Soviet World War II veteran Vasily Kononov

roleset.note: PRESSURIZE-V NOTES: Roleset for 'pressuriz'e based on internet searches, wordnet. Added because no frameset existed. No verbnet class. Comparison to 'inflate'. Roleset by Julia. (from pressurize.01-v)
